Question
========

On a given hospital ward, over the course of a year, records are kept of how many men and how many women are lying on the first day of the month lie. \ \ The numbers for the number of women during that year were:_____. 10 13 12 9 9 11 12 12 10 14 12 10\ The sample variance is:

Answerlist
----------

* 0.192
* 1.586
* 2.306
* 2.515

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.192: Incorrect
* 1.586: Incorrect
* 2.306: Incorrect
* 2.515: Correct
